it.catchword.entity

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedGame

    public interface Game
    Core interface of the game. Who implements it has to manage all the game and merge the others component (network, core, gui)

    • Method Detail

      • addChatMessage

        void addChatMessage(ChatMessage message)
        This method is called by NetworkAdapter, whenever another user send a chat message
        Parameters:
        message - The new message received

      • getAllUser

        java.util.List<Player> getAllUser()
        This method will return all the users playing the game.
        Returns:
        The list of all users

      • getChannels

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getChannels()
        This method returns the current server's channel list
        Returns:
        The list of the channels name

      • getChatMessages

        java.util.List<ChatMessage> getChatMessages()
        Returns:
        The list of all chat messages

      • getLocalUser

        Player getLocalUser()
        This method will return only the local user.
        Returns:
        The local user playing the game.

      • getManches

        int getManches()
        Returns:
        The number of the current manche

      • getMancheTime

        int getMancheTime()
        Returns:
        The remaining seconds before the current manche ends

      • getStatus

        int getStatus()
        This method will return the status of the game. The differents status are stored in the Constant class.
        • GAME_STATUS_INIT
        • GAME_STATUS_WAIT
        • GAME_STATUS_ACTIVE
        • GAME_STAtUS_END
        Returns:
        The status of the game.

      • getWord

        java.lang.String getWord(int index)
        This method will ask to board for the word in the hole with index @param index
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the hole which we want to get word in.
        Returns:
        The string in the indexed hole

      • getWordInfo

        int getWordInfo(java.lang.String word)
        This method try to find if the local player has caught passed word. If so, returns the obtained score.
        Parameters:
        word - The word to search for in the history
        Returns:
        Score value, if the word has been caught 0, otherwise

      • joinChannel

        int joinChannel(java.lang.String playerName,
              java.lang.String channelName,
              java.lang.String networkAddress)
        This method try to let the local player join a specified channel.
        Parameters:
        playerName - Username of the local player
        channelName - The channel name of the channel where the local user wants to join
        networkAddress - The hostname/ip of the local user
        Returns:
        1, if everything goes fine 0, otherwise

      • removeLastPlayer

        void removeLastPlayer()
        This method removes the last player of the rank

      • removeWord

        void removeWord(java.lang.String word)
        This method will ask to board to remove the word at the passed index.
        Parameters:
        word - The index of the hole where we want remove the word.

      • sendChatMessage

        void sendChatMessage(java.lang.String message)
        It permits to the local player to send a chat message
        Parameters:
        message - The message to sent

      • startGame

        int startGame()
        This method is called by the local player. He is owner of the channel and he wants to start the game
        Returns:
        Constant.OK, if everything goes fine Constant.NOT_ENOUGH_PLAYERS, if there isn't enough player to start game

      • startGame

        void startGame(long time)
        This method is called by the network adapter. It means that the owner of the room chose to start the game.
        Parameters:
        time - The time to wait in ms since now.

      • wordCaught

        void wordCaught(int index)
        The local player has caught the word which is in position 'index' on the board.
        Parameters:
        index - The board's index of the word
